column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////I LOVE this place!!! Definitely the best ramen spot in Houston. It is a cozy atmosphere with delicious food. I have never had an issue with service at this restaurant. Though there is ALWAYS a wait no matter what day of the week you go
column2: it is totally worth it in my opinion. My boyfriend is vegetarian and even though he doesn't enjoy the vegetarian option much
column3: he absolutely loves the vegan one. Luckily
column4: there is something on the menu that caters to both of our tastes. It is great for dates but not so much for groups
column5: as you have to wait until everyone is present before they seat you and the wait even just for 4 people can get very long.
